# Defending Bone (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 2]], [[2nd Level Inquisitor Spells|Inquisitor 2]], [[2nd Level Magus Spells|Magus 2]], [[2nd Level Oracle Spells|Oracle 2]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Witch Spells|Witch 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 4th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 4]], [[BoXM 4th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 4]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F (a Medium creatureâ€™s skull or femur), DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 hour/level or until discharged

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Inner Sea Gods, pg. 232

You animate a bone with necromantic energy, giving it the power to float near your body and interpose itself against physical attacks.

You gain damage reduction 5/bludgeoning. Once the bone has prevented a total of 5 points of damage per caster level (maximum 50 points), it is destroyed and the spell is discharged. This spell has no effect if you have damage reduction from another source.
